subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Knowing that it doesn’t hurt to schmooze before I.O.C. members take their secret vote, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva said he planned to be in Copenhagen on Oct. 2.
snippet: Knowing that it doesn’t hurt to schmooze before I.O.C. members take their secret vote, Luiz Inácio Lula da Silva said he planned to be in Copenhagen on Oct. 2.
